name: House Design & Home Decoration
description:
Buy old houses renovate according to your skills and expertise. Design great home and sell them at high profit. Design and decorate dream houses for the clients and sell them for greater profit. Become famous house décor in the city. This game offers you a chance to enhance your decoration skills which may assist you in your day to day life as well.

Features:

Beautiful house furniture models
Different variety of decoration accessories
Huge collection of wallpapers paint n vinyl
Entreating sounds effects
